Listing 24.12: Example output from evaluating a 1D CNN model for activity recognition.
Now that we have seen how to load the data and ﬁt a 1D CNN model, we can investigate
whether we can further lift the skill of the model with some hyperparameter tuning.
24.4 Tuned CNN Model
In this section, we will tune the model in an eﬀort to further improve performance on the
problem. We will look at three main areas:
